meta.description: Optimize the number of small and large containers used to maximize the amount of paste produced given resource constraints.

sets.name: CONTAINERS
sets.description: Types of containers used to make the paste.

params.name: water_requirement
params.description: Water units required per container type.

params.name: pill_requirement
params.description: Pill units required per container type.

params.name: paste_production
params.description: Paste units produced per container type.

params.name: available_pills
params.description: Total available units of powdered pill.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of each container type to use.

objective.name: max_paste_production
objective.description: Maximize the total amount of paste produced.

constraints.name: water_constraint
constraints.description: Total water used must not exceed available water.

constraints.name: pill_constraint
constraints.description: Total pills used must not exceed available pills.
